directions: In a medium bowl, combine pudding mix and milk. Mix well and let stand until thickened.
In a large bowl, beat cream cheese until smooth. Add pudding and mix well. Finally, fold in whipped topping.
ingredients: 1 (1.4 ounce) package sugar-free instant pudding mix
1 (8 ounce) container lite frozen whipped topping, thawed
title: Sugar-Free Frosting
